channel.title: Item on Item random
channel.description: How can i make that when i use one item on other to have a change of giving some items...i know how to make it giving me one item and deleting the ones used but i want to know how i can make so have a change of giving me like 5 items so every item got 20% change of being got.

item.title: Item on Item random
item.dc:creator: @Chemical1 Chemical
item.description:
@Chemical1 wrote:

open item2.java and put this in :

[code]public static int randomItem[] = {itemID,ItemID,ItemID};

public static int randomItem()
{
	return Item[(int)(Math.random()*Item.length)];
}[/code]

Change itemID to the item ID of the items you want, it can be as many as you want, EG if you want a random barrow item to come out put in barrow item IDs into it. then go to the item on item code in client.java and put

	      addItem(Item2.randomItem(), 1);

you could also change the 1 to however many of the random item you want.

Read full topic

item.title: Item on Item random
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

well if you… erm if u want 5 items to be “got” and your talking about something like the well, then just add this below it if you know about the randoms.

[size=8pt]example.[/size]

addItem(Item2.randomwell(), 1); addItem(Item2.randomwell(), 1); addItem(Item2.randomwell(), 1); addItem(Item2.randomwell(), 1); addItem(Item2.randomwell(), 1);

changing the 1 to a 5 does nothing. so just add the random four more times like i did up there and you’ll have what you want. remember to compile.

Read full topic
